thread.title: BRIEF-New Media Investment To Acquire Akron Beacon Journal For $16.0 Mln

title: BRIEF-New Media Investment To Acquire Akron Beacon Journal For $16.0 Mln

organizations.name: brief-new media investment to acquire akron beacon journal

text:
April 11, 2018 / 8:38 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-New Media Investment To Acquire Akron Beacon Journal For $16.0 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 11 (Reuters) - New Media Investment Group Inc : 
* NEW MEDIA ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE THE AKRON BEACON JOURNAL FOR $16.0 MILLION AND ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO SELL SUBSTANTIALLY ALL OF THE PUBLISHING AND RELATED ASSETS OF GATEHOUSE MEDIA ALASKA HOLDINGS, INC. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
